data.comment: The match is underway at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Minami Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Shimizu's Shota Kaneko gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Sapporo at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 4, Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Sapporo's Yoshiaki Komai gets in a shot on goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 7, Sapporo to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Can Sapporo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Shimizu.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 12, Shimizu's Elsinho breaks free at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Minami Tojo awards Sapporo a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 13, Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Sapporo.
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Shimizu close to the penalty box.
Sapporo drives forward and Musashi Suzuki gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In Shizuoka Shimizu attack through Yusuke Goto. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Minami Tojo awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Sapporo!
In the minute 29, Minami Tojo signals a Sapporo throw-in in Shimizu's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sapporo drive upfield and Musashi Suzuki gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Shimizu defender.
In the minute 31, Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
Yoshiaki Komai for Sapporo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 33, Shimizu needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
Sapporo are pushing forward but Chanathip Songkrasin's finish is wide of the goal.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Shimizu.
In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Shimizu.
In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Minami Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
Chanathip Songkrasin of Sapporo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 40, Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 43, Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Throw-in Shimizu.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Shimizu in Shizuoka.
An attacking Shimizu player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Minami Tojo blows to end the first-half.
Daiki Suga for Sapporo has been booked by Minami Tojo and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Shota Kaneko.
The second half has started at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Ryosuke Shindo with Shunta Tanaka. This is the second substitution made today by Michael Petrovic.
The away team replace Kazuki Fukai with Douglas.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Sapporo's Takuma Arano goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
In the minute 50, Yugo Tatsuta's header is off-target for Shimizu.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Free kick Sapporo.
In the minute 52, Musashi Suzuki grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Shunta Tanaka (Sapporo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Throw-in for Sapporo at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Sapporo's Musashi Suzuki gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
Kenta Nishizawa for Shimizu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Sapporo at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 60, Sapporo push forward at IAI Stadium Nihondaira and Musashi Suzuki gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Shimizu defence.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 61, Shimizu's Elsinho breaks free at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
Shimizu make their first substitution with Keita Nakamura replacing Ryo Takeuchi.
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Sapporo.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
At IAI Stadium Nihondaira, Shunta Tanaka has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 64, Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sapporo's Daiki Suga gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Shimizu defender.
Musashi Suzuki (Sapporo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 67, Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sapporo's half?
Kim Min-Tae is on a sub for Tomoki Takamine for Sapporo.
Michael Petrovic (Sapporo) is making a fourth substitution, with Kosuke Shirai replacing Lucas Fernandes.
In the minute 69, Shimizu are coming forward and Elsinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
Free kick Shimizu.
Important block from the Sapporo defence as Yusuke Goto fires in a strike for Shimizu.
In the minute 71, Kim Min-Tae (Sapporo) has received a yellow card from Minami Tojo.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
In the minute 72, Elsinho (Shimizu) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
Shimizu push forward at IAI Stadium Nihondaira and Renato Augusto gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Sapporo defence.
In the minute 73, Minami Tojo signals a Shimizu throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Minami Tojo signals a throw-in for Shimizu, close to Sapporo's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
In the minute 77, Shimizu pushes forward through Kenta Nishizawa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Shimizu.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 79, Shimizu's Yusuke Goto attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Minami Tojo awards Sapporo a goal kick.
In Shizuoka Sapporo attack through Kosuke Shirai. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Douglas (Sapporo) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 82, In Shizuoka Shimizu attack through Elsinho. The finish is off target, however.
Minami Tojo awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Teerasil Dangda is replacing Shota Kaneko for the home team.
In the minute 85, Goal! Shimizu have got their heads in front thanks to a Renato Augusto strike.
The away team replace Chanathip Songkrasin with Takuro Kaneko.
Yusuke Goto of Shimizu gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Sapporo.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Sapporo.
Shimizu's Elsinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Shizuoka. The final score is 3-1.
Togo Umeda (Shimizu) has received a first yellow card.
Takuma Arano is booked for the away team.
Shimizu take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to Carlinhos Junior.
